Title: Alistair Pitt (No. 103)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Nicole Phillips (teleplay by), Nicole Phillips (story by), Adam Sussman (story by), Brandon Margolis (executive story editor), Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brian Studler (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red and Liz work with the taskforce to stop a negotiator who has resurfaced to unite two rival crime families. Tom reconnects with a former flame.
